review: If you have a smart TV or DVD/Bluray, you really don't need it.  Having said that I got one anyway.  I'm not real impressed with my smart Bluray's connectivity and its slow reaction to commands.  This little thing streams YouTube and Nextflix effortlessly. The only draw back, it's support by a very limited number of content providers.  It will stream much of what you have in your Chrome browser window, but places like Comcast have prevented me from streaming from my computer to my TV.  Yes, of course I already have Comcast on my TV, but I tried it to see if it would work.  It's new, so it will have issues and shortcomings, but I think it's great.
author: The Tall Paul
